headline.print_headline: China: Leftists Express Support for Disgraced Politician
headline.seo: China: Leftist Support for Disgraced Politician
headline.main: China: Leftists Express Support for Disgraced Politician

docs.snippet: Dozens of leftists signed an open letter to the chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People’s Congress, asking him not to expel Bo Xilai from the congress....
docs.abstract: Dozens of Chinese leftists sign open letter to Wu Bangguo, chairman of Standing Committee of National People's Congress, asking him not to expel disgraced official Bo Xilai.
docs.lead_paragraph: Dozens of leftists signed an open letter to the chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People’s Congress, asking him not to expel Bo Xilai from the congress.

headline.print_headline: Somalia: With Navies on Guard, Pirate Attacks Decline
headline.seo: Somalia: Navies Cause Pirate Attacks to Decline
headline.main: Somalia: With Navies on Guard, Pirate Attacks Decline

docs.snippet: Sea piracy worldwide fell to its lowest level since 2008 over the first nine months of this year as navies worked to prevent attacks off the coast of Somalia...
docs.lead_paragraph: Sea piracy worldwide fell to its lowest level since 2008 over the first nine months of this year as navies worked to prevent attacks off the coast of Somalia

headline.print_headline: Florida: Hazing Defendant Avoids Jail Time
headline.main: Florida: Hazing Defendant Avoids Jail Time

docs.snippet: The first defendant to be sentenced in the hazing death of a Florida A&M drum major avoided jail time at his sentencing on Monday....
docs.abstract: Brian Jones, first defendant to be sentenced in hazing death of Florida A&M drum major Robert Champion, avoids jail time but is given six months community control, monitored by an ankle bracelet, two years probation and 200 hours of community service.
docs.lead_paragraph: The first defendant to be sentenced in the hazing death of a Florida A&M drum major avoided jail time at his sentencing on Monday.

headline.print_headline: To Stand Out, Campaign For Adobe Gets Blunt
headline.seo: Adobe Marketing Campaign Works With Coarse Language
headline.main: To Stand Out, Campaign for Adobe Gets Blunt

docs.snippet: The new campaign from Adobe Systems is using nonprintable words to get attention for its products....
docs.abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column investigates new campaign by Adobe that makes use of a barely-disguised profanity in order to promote its line of marketing and social networking tools; campaign is produced by Goodby, Silverstein & Partners of San Francisco.
docs.lead_paragraph: The new campaign from Adobe Systems is using nonprintable words to get attention for its products.

headline.print_headline: Texas: Case On School Financing Begins
headline.main: Texas: Case on School Financing Begins

docs.snippet: Lawyers for about 600 school districts argued Monday that the school financing system is so “hopelessly broken” that it violates the State Constitution....
docs.abstract: Lawyers for about 600 school districts in Texas argue in State District Court in Austin that school financing system is so 'hopelessly broken' that it violates State Constitution; suits were filed after State Legislature cut $4 billion for schools and $1.4 billion in grant programs in 2011.
docs.lead_paragraph: Lawyers for about 600 school districts argued Monday that the school financing system is so “hopelessly broken” that it violates the State Constitution.

headline.print_headline: Bears Survive Injury Scare To Beat Lions
headline.seo: Chiefs’ Crennel Replaces Matt Cassel With Brady Quinn at Quarterback
headline.main: Bears Survive Injury Scare To Beat Lions

docs.snippet: Romeo Crennel, the Kansas City coach, hopes a switch at the most visible position will jump-start the 1-5 Chiefs....
docs.abstract: NFL Roundup; Chicago Bears beat Detroit Lions, 13-7; other football news noted.
docs.lead_paragraph: Romeo Crennel, the Kansas City coach, hopes a switch at the most visible position will jump-start the 1-5 Chiefs.

headline.print_headline: Flu Vaccine Effective Against 4 Strains, Study Finds
headline.main: Flu Vaccine Effective Against 4 Strains, Study Finds

docs.snippet: Vaccines that protect against four strains of flu proved just as effective in clinical trials as traditional ones that protect against three, two vaccine companies announced Monday....
docs.abstract: Sanofi Pasteur and GlaxoSmithKline scientists report new vaccines that protect against four strains of flu are just as effective in clinical trials as traditional ones that protect against three strains; quadrivalent vaccines are being evaluated by Food and Drug Administration and are not approved for public use at this time.
docs.lead_paragraph: Vaccines that protect against four strains of flu proved just as effective in clinical trials as traditional ones that protect against three, two vaccine companies announced Monday.

headline.print_headline: Stung by Criticism, Russian Lawmakers Point to Human Rights Abuses in U.S.
headline.seo: Russian Lawmakers Cite U.S. Rights Abuses
headline.main: Stung by Criticism, Russian Lawmakers Point to Human Rights Abuses in U.S.

docs.snippet: At an old-fashioned hearing in the Russian Parliament, a discussion of human rights violations committed by the United States was reminiscent of the cold war era....

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject

docs.abstract: Series of Russian lawmakers take to podium in Parliament to catalog rights violations perpetrated by Americans over the years, in response to intensified Western criticism of Russia's human rights record; session is reminiscent of cold war era.
docs.lead_paragraph: At an old-fashioned hearing in the Russian Parliament, a discussion of human rights violations committed by the United States was reminiscent of the cold war era.

headline.print_headline: Russia: Imprisoned Pussy Riot Members Moved From Moscow
headline.seo: Russia: Imprisoned Pussy Riot Members Moved
headline.main: Russia: Imprisoned Pussy Riot Members Moved From Moscow

docs.snippet: Two members of the Russian punk group Pussy Riot have been sent to prisons far from Moscow despite asking to serve out their terms in the capital....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two members of the Russian punk group Pussy Riot have been sent to prisons far from Moscow despite asking to serve out their terms in the capital.

headline.print_headline: Finland: Prime Minister Confronted by Man With Knife
headline.seo: Finland: Prime Minister Encounters Man With Knife
headline.main: Finland: Prime Minister Confronted by Man With Knife

docs.snippet: Prime Minister Jyrki Tapani Katainen was unhurt on Monday after being confronted by a man with a knife at a campaign rally in Turku, his aides said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Jyrki Tapani Katainen was unhurt on Monday after being confronted by a man with a knife at a campaign rally in Turku, his aides said.
